description: This table will display the approval history for transactions.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital billing transaction.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: APRV_HX_INST_DTTM
columns.description: This column stores the instant that the user worked the hospital temporary transaction before the adjustment was completed.

columns.name: APRV_HX_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The status given to the approval.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Approved


Declined


Held

columns.name: APRV_HX_LVL_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the status that was on the hospital temporary transaction when a user worked it.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Level 1


Level 2


Level 3


Level 4


Level 5

columns.name: APRV_HX_USER_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the user who worked the hospital temporary transaction.

columns.name: APRV_HX_CMT
columns.description: This column stores the comment entered when approving/rejecting/holding the hospital temporary transaction.
